articles.author: Moki Edwin Kindzeka
articles.title: Central African Republic declares mpox outbreak, works to stop spread - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: A health official says the virus has been confirmed in several towns and villages
articles.content:
Yaounde, Cameroon  Central African Republic officials say they are meeting with the governments of neighboring countries in an effort to stop the spread of mpox, formerly known as monkeypox.
